text: Bei ziji de e xing suo mihuo, ziyiweishi xingshan zhe,[nandao tong zunxing zhengdao zhe shi yiyang de ma?] Xuzhi, an la yu shi shei mi wu, jiu shi shei mi wu; yu shi shei zunxing zhengdao, jiu shi shei zunxing zhengdao. Yinci, ni buyao yin dui tamen de beishang er shanghai zishen. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, an la que shi quanzhi de.
